also.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: in addition to something else that you have mentioned
also.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Information is also available on womenâ€™s health care.
She sings beautifully and also plays the flute and piano.

also.translation[0].definitions[0].note_: In written English, avoid starting a sentence with also. Use furthermore or moreover instead, or put also before the main verb:
also.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: used to say that the same thing is true about another person or thing
also.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: My girlfriend was also called Helen.
